text:
@RealJamesWoods Nothing will make those of us who followed all the rules, more angry, than if the upturn in Covid-19 cases is traced back to the rioters.

Trapped at home, wearing masks...
Lost business, lost jobs, suffering depression & suicide!

Pain is coming for those little ass-wipes!
